CustomField.description: The Revenue Amount for this account and all OPC related child accounts for the year to date
CustomField.formula: Apr_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Dec_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Feb_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Jan_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Jul_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Jun_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Mar_Group_Actual_Amount__c + May_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Nov_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Oct_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Sep_Group_Actual_Amount__c + Aug_Group_Actual_Amount__c
CustomField.label: Total Group Revenue Amount
